name: I Kill Zombies
description:
Its time to maim and murder your way to the top of an exiting new game show! I Kill Zombies see's you trapped inside a giant arena fending off the forces of the undead as one of three characters. Do you have what it takes to survive? Who kills zombies? I Kill Zombies!!!
